metadata.title: USN-6613-1 -- Ceph vulnerability
metadata.description: Lucas Henry discovered that Ceph incorrectly handled specially crafted POST requests. An uprivileged user could use this to  bypass Ceph's authorization checks and upload a file to any bucket.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6613-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-rbd - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python3-rbd - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python-rados - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-mgr - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-test - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 rbd-mirror - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 rbd-nbd - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 librbd-dev - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 libradosstriper1 - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 rbd-fuse - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 librados-dev - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 libcephfs-jni - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 libradosstriper-dev - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 librados2 - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-mon - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 libcephfs2 - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 librgw2 - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-mds - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 radosgw - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 librbd1 - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python3-rgw - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python-rgw - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python-ceph - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 libcephfs-dev - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 rados-objclass-dev - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-osd - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python3-ceph-argparse - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 librgw-dev - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python3-rados - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-base - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python-cephfs - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 python3-cephfs - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-fuse - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-common - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 libcephfs-java - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 ceph-resource-agents - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.11+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
